headline: NiSource (NI) Is a Great Choice for 'Trend' Investors, Here's Why
summary: NiSource (NI) could be a solid choice for shorter-term investors looking to capitalize on the recent price trend in fundamentally sound stocks. It is one of the many stocks that passed through our shorter-term trading strategy-based screen.
